hackathon-description-text: Last year, ConUHacks gave over 600 students the opportunity to create and interact with students and tech industry professionals. This year, ConUHacks will be a 24 hour hackathon with 600+ participants. It will be held at Concordia University in the heart of downtown Montreal, Canada. The event is open to all university students that have a passion for creating things with technology!
hackathon-requirements: Please tag the APIs you're using in your project.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Prize by Astucemedia 1ST TEAM (Winning team): 4 X $250.00 visa gift card + an invitation to a special cocktail/meet and greet event with the management team at the Astucemedia studio. 2nd TEAM: 4 X $100 visa gift card + an invitation to a special cocktail/meet and greet event with the management team at the Astucemedia studio. 3rd TEAM: 4 X $50.00 visa gift card + an invitation to a special cocktail/meet and greet event with the management team at the Astucemedia studio.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Visa Gift Cards + Invitation to a Special Cocktail/Meet and Greet Event with the Astucemedia Management Team (Astucemedia)
LiteHawk BURST Quadcopter Drone with Camera (IBM)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $30 in Amazon Gift Cards for the best usage of AWS technologies in your hack.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Amazon Web Services (AWS)
Best IoT Hack Using Qualcomm Device (MLH)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Create a heartwarming hack! Each winning team member will win a prize that contains all the warmies and the fuzzies.
Create a hack that gives us the chills! Each winning team member will win a prize that contains all the chillies and the creepies.
A year of Wolfram|One Personal Edition plus a one-year subscription of Wolfram|Alpha Pro for each team member.
Major League Hacking (MLH) Medals for each team member.
Each team member will receive a Bluetooth Headset, $125 in Digital Ocean credits and a MLH medal.
Each team member will receive a VR Headset, $250 in Digital Ocean credits, Sketch licenses and a MLH medal.
Each team member will receive a drone, one year subscription to JetBrains, $500 in Digital Ocean credits and a MLH medal.

hackathon-description-header: Hack is temporary. Glory is forever.
